attributes.additional_details: It will be a deterrent to all non British immigration applicants and ease the cost of costly court cases
attributes.background: By deporting all non British criminals it will ease overcrowded prisons take the strain off the NHS and save the British tax payer billions

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Deport all foreign criminals with effect immediately: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705093
